modName: The Beauty of Skyrim - Screenshot Compilation
summary: I have always wondered why noone has not put any dedication and work into bringing people good looking pictures of Skyrim. Recently, i have been running around in different locations taking screenshots to my fitting and putting them as backgrounds for my desktop.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/826/thebeautyofskyrimlogo.png/][img]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/447/thebeautyofskyrimlogo.png[/img][/url]

Hello, my name is Illumination, formerly known as xZeitx on the Nexus forums and this is my SCDC (Skyrim Screenshot Download Compilation) also known as "The Beauty of Skyrim"

I started this project back in february last year and I promised that I would upload more. It's not hard to run around and take pictures in Skyrim, and getting everything right and to make it look good is really time consuming. I only take pictures with the Vanilla look and HD textures provided by Bethesda, plus a sun glare mod and better looking models.

I didn't expect the download count to explode and I only hoped for a few. It's an amazing feeling to know that people like the work I put into taking these screenshots. I don't make mods and I don't have the time and interest at the moment to try it out. There will be more screenshots coming soon and I hope that people are still around. If you Endorse, you will know when the next screenshot compilation is ready for download and a like and a comment is always appreciated :)

Update 15.8.2014
---------------------
Artwork Pack is available for download! Made it as a filler while working on the Solstheim and Dawnguard screenshots.

TweaksLogon
--------------------
This program will change the background on your windows login screen
author: Illumination
